document.full_text: joe morgan, the former red sox manager, was on hand in 1981 when boston's minor league team in pawtucket, r.i., played a 33-inning game ' though he was ejected in the 22nd.
document.title: 2011 baseball preview: the endless game of a lifetime, recalled by a baseball lifer
